channel.description: Recent content in 个人 on ivy

item.title: 汉化版
item.description: 汉化版基于前一部分作者对片上网络领域四个问题的解决方案，我们可以给出目前研究的结果和局限性。 拓扑结构: NoC 拓扑从2D 网格发展到更复杂的3D 网格

item.title: References:
item.description: References: Wang, J., & Ye, Y. (2020). Ant colony optimization-based thermal-aware adaptive routing mechanism for optical NoCs. IEEE Transactions on Computer-Aided Design of Integrated Circuits and Systems, 40(9), 1836-1849. Zheng, H., Wang, K., & Louri, A. (2021). Adapt-noc: A flexible network-on-chip design for heterogeneous manycore architectures. 2021 IEEE International Symposium on High-Performance Computer Architecture (HPCA), 723-735. Duato J, Yalamanchili S, Ni L M. Interconnection Networks: An Engineering Approach. 2nd ed.

item.title: homework
item.description: homeworkBased on the solutions to the four problems in the field of on-chip networks presented in the previous part by different authors, we can present the results and limitations of the current research. Topology Structures: The evolution of NoC topologies from 2D meshes to more complex 3D meshes, tori, and hypercubes reflects the need to optimize performance, power, and area (Bjerregaard & Mahadevan, 2006). While 2D meshes offer scalability, they

item.title: 物联网与云计算
item.description: 物联网与云计算边缘计算与传统的集中式云计算相比，各自的优势和劣势是什么？请分析在不同的应用场景下，何时更适合采用边缘计算，何时更适合采用云计
